summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the functionality and robustness of a DTLS transport component used in real‑time communication, covering normal data flow, handshake procedures, and a variety of failure scenarios such as abrupt disconnects, malformed packets, fingerprint mismatches, and SRTP processing errors.
business_intent: Guarantee secure and reliable media transmission in WebRTC applications by detecting and preventing transport‑level faults, ensuring proper error handling, and maintaining data integrity across DTLS/SRTP channels.
